column2: Many scholars have been travelling around the world to find the best way to educate the people of $COUNTRY$. Word has spread about the new cultured schools in $COUNTRY$ and people are wondering what is the best way to move forward. Encouraging learning of the new ways could drastically increase our education but some might rather the ancient ways.
